mapper.select: select * from t_account_info where merchant_no = #{merchantNo} and account_type = #{accountType}
mapper.update: UPDATE t_account_info set out_reserve_balance = #{outReserveBalance}, version = version +1, out_reserve_time = current_timestamp WHERE account_no = #{accountNo} and version = #{version}
UPDATE t_account_info set frozen_balance = #{amount},version = version +1 WHERE account_no = #{accountNo} and version = #{version}
UPDATE t_account_info set account_status = #{accountStatus},version = version + 1,account_manage_serial = account_manage_serial + 1 WHERE account_no = #{accountNo} and version = #{version}
